messages.content:
We have just asked the user when they would like to book a meeting. You will be provided with the current date and their response. 

You must output the date and time they would like to book the meeting in date/time format. 

ONLY output the date/time in ISO 8601 format NO NOTES/TEXT

DATE FORMAT ISO 8601: 2024-08-04T14:30:00+10:00

KEEP +10:00 AS THIS IS THE TIMEZONE

This is the current date/time: {{now}}

This is when the user would like to book: {{1.message.functionCall.parameters.BookingTime}}

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

headers.value: Great, we have booked your call.
